Package com.phasmidsoftware.dsaipg.misc

Interface TailCall<T>

Type Parameters:
T - the underlying type of the result of the TailCall.
All Superinterfaces:
Supplier<TailCall<T>>
Functional Interface:
This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.
@FunctionalInterface public interface TailCall<T> extends Supplier<TailCall<T>>
Interface to define the behavior of tail call recursion. This uses a version of trampolining which makes use of a lazy list provided by the Stream mechanism.
